20101229040430.000|20101229040432.000|CC1|THE OUTSIDE, ROY FREED FOUND

20101229040442.000|20101229040444.000|CC1|ROOMMATES, BUT IT TURNS OUT HE  
20101229040444.000|20101229040445.000|CC1|HAD OTHER INTENTIONS AS FAR AS  
20101229040445.000|20101229040447.000|CC1|FORCE HIMSELF ON ME SO WE GOT   
20101229040447.000|20101229040448.000|CC1|INTO A LITTLE ALTERCATION LAST  
20101229040448.000|20101229040458.000|CC1|NIGHT.

20101229040500.000|20101229040506.000|CC1|NO, HE WAS LIKE BIGGER THAN ME. 
20101229040506.000|20101229040508.000|CC1|THE ONLY GOOD THING THAT CAME   
20101229040508.000|20101229040509.000|CC1|OUT OF THIS BLACK EYE IS WHICH  
20101229040509.000|20101229040510.000|CC1|IT GAVE ME A SINGLE CELL.       
20101229040510.000|20101229040512.000|CC1|WHICH IS KIND OF A CATCH-22,    
20101229040512.000|20101229040513.000|CC1|SINCE DAY ONE I'VE GOT HERE,    
20101229040513.000|20101229040514.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN REQUESTING ONE.       
20101229040514.000|20101229040515.000|CC1|REALLY, I JUST STAY BY HIMSELF. 
20101229040515.000|20101229040517.000|CC1|THE ONLY PEOPLE I KICK IT WITH  
20101229040517.000|20101229040518.000|CC1|IS GAY PEOPLE, PEOPLE THAT      
20101229040518.000|20101229040519.000|CC1|IDENTIFY THEMSELVES AS BEING    
20101229040519.000|20101229040520.000|CC1|TRANSGENDER.

20101229040522.000|20101229040526.000|CC1|OF CLOSEST FRIENDS.

20101229040528.000|20101229040530.000|CC1|PARTY.                          
20101229040530.000|20101229040531.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S TODAY?

20101229040538.000|20101229040541.000|CC1|THAT'S NOT ON YOUR CALENDAR?

20101229040547.000|20101229040548.000|CC1|LITTLE STRIP SHOW.              
20101229040548.000|20101229040551.000|CC1|OR SOMETHING.

20101229040557.000|20101229040558.000|CC1|KNOW WHAT THEY'RE TALKING ABOUT.
20101229040558.000|20101229040559.000|CC1|>> ONE MEMBER OF THE TRIO,      
20101229040559.000|20101229040601.000|CC1|ROBERT BURZEE HAS BEEN AT LIMON 
20101229040601.000|20101229040602.000|CC1|FOR THREE YEARS AND HAS BEEN OUT
20101229040602.000|20101229040603.000|CC1|OF THE CLOSET FOR MOST OF THAT  
20101229040603.000|20101229040606.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20101229040606.000|20101229040608.000|CC1|>> I'M GAY, AND I DIDN'T WANT IT
20101229040608.000|20101229040609.000|CC1|TO BE KNOWN, BUT I WAS INVOLVED 
20101229040609.000|20101229040611.000|CC1|WITH A GUY HERE.                
20101229040611.000|20101229040613.000|CC1|AND THINGS AS THEY WERE, THE    
20101229040613.000|20101229040619.000|CC1|GUYS FOUND OUT, OBVIOUSLY.      
20101229040619.000|20101229040622.000|CC1|THERE'S SOMEWHAT GAY ACTIVITY   
20101229040622.000|20101229040625.000|CC1|GOING ON IN THE PRISON

20101229040626.000|20101229040628.000|CC1|AMAZING, BECAUSE SOME OF THE    
20101229040628.000|20101229040629.000|CC1|GUYS THAT DETEST THE GAY        
20101229040629.000|20101229040631.000|CC1|LIFESTYLE THE MOST ARE THE ONES 
20101229040631.000|20101229040631.000|CC1|THAT SNEAK IN MY HOUSE OR ASK   
20101229040631.000|20101229040633.000|CC1|THEM TO FOOL AROUND WITH THEM.  
20101229040633.000|20101229040634.000|CC1|BUT ULTIMATELY ON THE YARD OR   
20101229040634.000|20101229040638.000|CC1|WHEN YOU'RE OUT IN GENERAL      
20101229040638.000|20101229040639.000|CC1|POPULATION MOVING AROUND, FOR   
20101229040639.000|20101229040641.000|CC1|THE MOST PART, PEOPLE WANT TO   
20101229040641.000|20101229040642.000|CC1|SHUN YOU OR WHATEVER, BASED ON  
20101229040642.000|20101229040644.000|CC1|THE FACT THAT IT'S JUST A COOL  
20101229040644.000|20101229040645.000|CC1|THING TO DO, FOR THE MOST PART. 
20101229040645.000|20101229040648.000|CC1|>> BURZEE, CHERRY, AND OTHERS   
20101229040648.000|20101229040657.000|CC1|ALL LOOK OUT FOR ROYANNA.       
20101229040657.000|20101229040659.000|CC1|>> SHE LOOKS LIKE A GIRL, SO NOW

20101229040740.000|20101229040742.000|CC1|PRISON PORTER, BUT FINDS OTHER

20101229040817.000|20101229040819.000|CC1|TO CONNECT WITH ANYONE.

20101229040912.000|20101229040915.000|CC1|HARASSING HIS NEIGHBOR.         
20101229040915.000|20101229040919.000|CC1|>> HE CAME OUT OF HIS CELL AND

20101229040921.000|20101229040922.000|CC1|THE CO'S ATTENTION AND HE

20101229040928.000|20101229040929.000|CC1|YOUR WINDOW OR SPIT THROUGH YOUR

20101229040932.000|20101229040935.000|CC1|DON'T RESPOND TO WHEN HE CALLS

20101229040939.000|20101229040940.000|CC1|TRIES EVEN MORE TO GET ME TO

20101229040946.000|20101229040948.000|CC1|>> BUT SCHREIBER SAYS HE HAD A  
20101229040948.000|20101229040949.000|CC1|REASON FOR SPITTING ON MAES'

20101229040957.000|20101229041001.000|CC1|BUT I CAME OUT SATURDAY TO TAKE 
20101229041001.000|20101229041004.000|CC1|MY SHOWER, I SPIT ON HIS WINDOW 
20101229041004.000|20101229041005.000|CC1|IN RETALIATION FOR HIS [ BLEEP ]
20101229041005.000|20101229041006.000|CC1|BALL.                           
20101229041006.000|20101229041008.000|CC1|>> LIEUTENANTS ANDY PIPER AND   
20101229041008.000|20101229041009.000|CC1|JIM FOX INVESTIGATED SHREIBER'S 
20101229041009.000|20101229041010.000|CC1|CLAIM, BUT CONCLUDED IT WAS     
20101229041010.000|20101229041016.000|CC1|FALSE.                          
20101229041016.000|20101229041017.000|CC1|>> WE PULLED MAES OUT AND WENT  
20101229041017.000|20101229041018.000|CC1|IN THERE TO DO A SEARCH AND     
20101229041018.000|20101229041019.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO EMPTY CONTAINERS HE
20101229041019.000|20101229041021.000|CC1|COULD HAVE DONE THAT WITH.

20101229045159.000|20101229045201.000|CC1|PRISON RULES.                   
20101229045201.000|20101229045202.000|CC1|>> BRING YOUR TWO OFFICERS OVER,
20101229045202.000|20101229045204.000|CC1|PLEASE, TO UNIT TWO.            
20101229045204.000|20101229045206.000|CC1|>> MOST OF THESE VIOLATIONS     
20101229045206.000|20101229045209.000|CC1|NEVER DISRUPT THE DAILY ROUTINE.
20101229045209.000|20101229045211.000|CC1|BUT TODAY, ONE HAS NOT ONLY     
20101229045211.000|20101229045213.000|CC1|ROCKED THE PRISON, IT SENT      
20101229045213.000|20101229045214.000|CC1|SHOCKWAVES THROUGH THE STATE'S  
20101229045214.000|20101229045217.000|CC1|ENTIRE DEPARTMENT OF            
20101229045217.000|20101229045219.000|CC1|CORRECTIONS.                    
20101229045219.000|20101229045220.000|CC1|>> YESTERDAY MORNING, THE       
20101229045220.000|20101229045222.000|CC1|SEGREGATION STAFF DID A STRIP   
20101229045222.000|20101229045223.000|CC1|SEARCH ON THE SEGREGATION       
20101229045223.000|20101229045225.000|CC1|CORRIDOR AND FOUND A LARGE      
20101229045225.000|20101229045227.000|CC1|QUANTITY OF HEROIN AND COCAINE  
20101229045227.000|20101229045228.000|CC1|THAT THE INMATE WAS APPARENTLY  
20101229045228.000|20101229045230.000|CC1|SMUGGLING TO A DISTRIBUTION     
20101229045230.000|20101229045231.000|CC1|POINT TO BE DISTRIBUTED TO THE  
20101229045231.000|20101229045234.000|CC1|INMATE POPULATION.              
20101229045234.000|20101229045235.000|CC1|>> WHAT WE DID IS WE WENT INTO A
20101229045235.000|20101229045237.000|CC1|FULL LOCKDOWN, STOPPED ALL      
20101229045237.000|20101229045238.000|CC1|MOVEMENT, HAD ASSISTANCE FROM   
20101229045238.000|20101229045239.000|CC1|OTHER FACILITIES COME IN AS WELL
20101229045239.000|20101229045241.000|CC1|AS THE K-9 UNITS.               
20101229045241.000|20101229045242.000|CC1|WE ARE RIGHT NOW GOING THROUGH  
20101229045242.000|20101229045244.000|CC1|AND SWEEPING EACH CELL, EACH    
20101229045244.000|20101229045245.000|CC1|POD, AND EACH UNIT THROUGHOUT   
20101229045245.000|20101229045248.000|CC1|THE ENTIRE FACILITY.            
20101229045248.000|20101229045250.000|CC1|>> IT INVOLVES ALL OF OUR STAFF 
20101229045250.000|20101229045251.000|CC1|AND THE ERT STAFF FROM FIVE     
20101229045251.000|20101229045253.000|CC1|OTHER FACILITIES.               
20101229045253.000|20101229045256.000|CC1|OF COURSE, PEOPLE HAVE TO FILL  
20101229045256.000|20101229045257.000|CC1|IN FOR THEM BECAUSE THEY CAN'T  
20101229045257.000|20101229045258.000|CC1|DO THEIR NORMAL JOBS.           
20101229045258.000|20101229045300.000|CC1|SO WE'RE BASICALLY IMPACTING THE
20101229045300.000|20101229045302.000|CC1|ENTIRE STATE.                   
20101229045302.000|20101229045304.000|CC1|>> THE POTENTIAL THAT MORE DRUGS
20101229045304.000|20101229045305.000|CC1|ARE EXISTING IS PRETTY          
20101229045305.000|20101229045306.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT AT THIS TIME.       
20101229045306.000|20101229045307.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH WE FOUND THE DRUGS ON  
20101229045307.000|20101229045310.000|CC1|ONE OFFENDER, THE OFFENDER HAS  
20101229045310.000|20101229045311.000|CC1|INDICATED THAT THEY WERE PICKED 
20101229045311.000|20101229045312.000|CC1|UP AT A DIFFERENT LOCATION      
20101229045312.000|20101229045314.000|CC1|WITHIN THE FACILITY.            
20101229045314.000|20101229045316.000|CC1|THEREFORE, THAT MAY ALLUDE THAT 
20101229045316.000|20101229045317.000|CC1|THERE MAY BE ADDITIONAL DRUGS IN
20101229045317.000|20101229045318.000|CC1|THE FACILITY.                   
20101229045318.000|20101229045319.000|CC1|>> THE HEROIN WAS OF VERY HIGH  
20101229045319.000|20101229045322.000|CC1|QUALITY.                        
20101229045322.000|20101229045323.000|CC1|SO WE HAVE A HIGH CHANCE OF     
20101229045323.000|20101229045324.000|CC1|GETTING OVERDOSES AND THINGS    
20101229045324.000|20101229045326.000|CC1|LIKE THAT.                      
20101229045326.000|20101229045327.000|CC1|IT IS ALSO WORTH A GREAT DEAL OF
20101229045327.000|20101229045329.000|CC1|MONEY.                          
20101229045329.000|20101229045330.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS ESTIMATED THE     
20101229045330.000|20101229045331.000|CC1|VALUE TO BE SOMEWHERE BETWEEN   
20101229045331.000|20101229045332.000|CC1|$10,000 AND $20,000.            
20101229045332.000|20101229045334.000|CC1|SOMEBODY IS GOING TO BE EXPECTED
20101229045334.000|20101229045335.000|CC1|TO PAY FOR THIS LOST            
20101229045335.000|20101229045337.000|CC1|MERCHANDISE.                    
20101229045337.000|20101229045339.000|CC1|SO WE COULD HAVE ASSAULTS OR WE 
20101229045339.000|20101229045341.000|CC1|COULD EVEN HAVE MURDERS.        
20101229045341.000|20101229045343.000|CC1|>> THOUGH CORRECTIONAL OFFICERS 
20101229045343.000|20101229045344.000|CC1|RARELY CARRY GUNS, THE THREAT OF
20101229045344.000|20101229045346.000|CC1|EMINENT VIOLENCE HAS EMERGENCY  
20101229045346.000|20101229045349.000|CC1|RESPONSE TEAMS HEAVILY ARMED AND
20101229045349.000|20101229045352.000|CC1|AT THE READY.                   
20101229045352.000|20101229045353.000|CC1|THE LOCKDOWN WILL LAST FOR AT   
20101229045353.000|20101229045356.000|CC1|LEAST THREE DAYS.

20101229045359.000|20101229045401.000|CC1|WORK 12-HOUR SHIFTS, SEARCHING  
20101229045401.000|20101229045402.000|CC1|EVERY CELL.                     
20101229045402.000|20101229045403.000|CC1|>> GENERALLY, IT IRRITATES THE  
20101229045403.000|20101229045404.000|CC1|INMATES.                        
20101229045404.000|20101229045407.000|CC1|OF COURSE, THEY'RE LOCKED DOWN.

20101229045721.000|20101229045722.000|CC1|THAT NOW.                       
20101229045722.000|20101229045723.000|CC1|>> HOW MUCH TIME DID YOU HAVE   
20101229045723.000|20101229045725.000|CC1|LEFT?

20101229045727.000|20101229045730.000|CC1|>> NO MATTER WHAT HAPPENS WITH

20101229045731.000|20101229045734.000|CC1|PRISON COULD BE PERILOUS.       
20101229045734.000|20101229045736.000|CC1|>> THIS OFFENDER COULD BE IN

20101229045808.000|20101229045810.000|CC1|BECAUSE KIND OF THE CODE IN HERE
20101229045810.000|20101229045811.000|CC1|IS IF YOU'RE HOLDING MY DRUGS,  
20101229045811.000|20101229045813.000|CC1|YOU'RE RESPONSIBLE FOR THEM.    
20101229045813.000|20101229045814.000|CC1|WE'VE HAD INMATES DIE FOR LESS

20101229045821.000|20101229045822.000|CC1|>> NOW ALL I CAN DO IS JUST GO  
20101229045822.000|20101229045824.000|CC1|THROUGH THE MOTIONS OF WHAT I

20101229045833.000|20101229045834.000|CC1|MY OWN BECAUSE I MADE THAT

20101229045839.000|20101229045841.000|CC1|SORRY YOU GUYS HAVE TO SEE ME

20101229045849.000|20101229045852.000|CC1|>> CHERRY WOULD SPEAK TO US ONE

20101229045856.000|20101229045900.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU FOR THE OPPORTUNITY

20101229045916.000|20101229045920.000|CC1|THAT I SHOULD HAVE BEEN TO YOU. 
20101229045920.000|20101229045923.000|CC1|MOST OF ALL, TO MY SON, WHEREVER
20101229045923.000|20101229045927.000|CC1|YOU ARE, I LOVE YOU AND I HOPE  
20101229045927.000|20101229045930.000|CC1|THAT WE CAN REBUILD OUR
